reviewText:
The item arrived in perfect condition, thank you very much.
Although the movie was thought that the IFC, this does not change the quality of the movie.

This is a horror-thriller with depth. If you're into hard core raw horror movies, this might not be for you. This is a serious, dark, well made, well thought out film. This is a new type of horror movie. One that is both mesmerizing and twisted. It relates to the fears inside all of us. Great stuff, and highly recommended if you appreciate the genre. This DVD on Amazon is great. It is all-region NTSC format so it will play in the USA. Has some cool special features also.
